verses.verse: כִּי֩ <WH3588> When יְרַחֵ֨ם <WH7355> will have mercy יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֶֽת־ <WH853> יַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> on Jacob וּבָחַ֥ר <WH977> and will yet choose עוֹד֙ <WH5750> and again בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְהִנִּיחָ֖ם <WH3240> and set עַל־ <WH5921> their own אַדְמָתָ֑ם <WH127> them in their own land וְנִלְוָ֤ה <WH3867> shall be joined הַגֵּר֙ <WH1616> and the strangers עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> and וְנִסְפְּח֖וּ <WH5596> with them and they shall cleave עַל־ <WH5921> and בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> to the house יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <WH3290> of Jacob

וּלְקָח֣וּם <WH3947> shall take עַמִּים֮ <WH5971> And the people וֶהֱבִיא֣וּם <WH935> them and bring אֶל־ <WH413> to מְקוֹמָם֒ <WH4725> them to their place וְהִֽתְנַחֲל֣וּם <WH5157> shall possess בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> and the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel עַ֚ל <WH5921> in אַדְמַ֣ת <WH127> them in the land יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> for servants וְלִשְׁפָח֑וֹת <WH8198> and handmaids וְהָיוּ֙ <WH1961> will take שֹׁבִ֣ים <WH7617> and they shall take them captives לְשֹֽׁבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH7617> whose captives וְרָד֖וּ <WH7287> they were and they shall rule בְּנֹגְשֵׂיהֶֽם׃ <WH5065> over their oppressors ס

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> will be in בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in the day הָנִ֤יחַ <WH5117> shall give thee rest יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that the LORD לְךָ֔ מֵֽעָצְבְּךָ֖ <WH6090> from thy sorrow וּמֵרָגְזֶ֑ךָ <WH7267> and from thy fear וּמִן־ <WH4480> at הָעֲבֹדָ֥ה <WH5656> bondage הַקָּשָׁ֖ה <WH7186> and from the hard אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עֻבַּד־ <WH5647> wherein thou wast made to serve בָּֽךְ׃

וְנָשָׂ֜אתָ <WH5375> That thou shalt take up הַמָּשָׁ֥ל <WH4912> this proverb הַזֶּ֛ה <WH2088> this עַל־ <WH5921> against מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> against the king בָּבֶ֖ל <WH894> of Babylon וְאָמָ֑רְתָּ <WH559> and say אֵ֚יךְ <WH349> How שָׁבַ֣ת <WH7673> ceased נֹגֵ֔שׂ <WH5065> How hath the oppressor שָׁבְתָ֖ה <WH7673> ceased מַדְהֵבָֽה׃ <WH4062> the golden city
שָׁבַ֥ר <WH7665> hath broken יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> The LORD מַטֵּ֣ה <WH4294> the staff רְשָׁעִ֑ים <WH7563> of the wicked שֵׁ֖בֶט <WH7626> [and] the sceptre מֹשְׁלִֽים׃ <WH4910> of the rulers

מַכֶּ֤ה <WH5221> He who smote עַמִּים֙ <WH5971> the people בְּעֶבְרָ֔ה <WH5678> in wrath מַכַּ֖ת <WH4347> stroke בִּלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> because סָרָ֑ה <WH5627> continual רֹדֶ֤ה <WH7287> he that ruled בָאַף֙ <WH639> in anger גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> the nations מֻרְדָּ֖ף <WH4783> is persecuted בְּלִ֥י <WH1097> [and] none חָשָֽׂךְ׃ <WH2820> hindereth
נָ֥חָה <WH5117> is at rest שָׁקְטָ֖ה <WH8252> [and] is quiet כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> The whole earth פָּצְח֖וּ <WH6476> they break forth רִנָּֽה׃ <WH7440> into singing

גַּם־ <WH1571> Even בְּרוֹשִׁ֛ים <WH1265> Yea the fir trees שָׂמְח֥וּ <WH8055> rejoice לְךָ֖ אַרְזֵ֣י <WH730> at thee [and] the cedars לְבָנ֑וֹן <WH3844> of Lebanon מֵאָ֣ז <WH227> for שָׁכַ֔בְתָּ <WH7901> [saying] Since thou art laid down לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> is come up הַכֹּרֵ֖ת <WH3772> no feller עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> against

שְׁא֗וֹל <WH7585> Hell מִתַּ֛חַת <WH8478> Thahash רָגְזָ֥ה <WH7264> from beneath is moved לְךָ֖ לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> for thee to meet בּוֹאֶ֑ךָ <WH935> [thee] at thy coming עוֹרֵ֨ר <WH5782> it stirreth up לְךָ֤ רְפָאִים֙ <WH7496> the dead כָּל־ <WH3605> all עַתּ֣וּדֵי <WH6260> for thee [even] all the chief ones אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the earth הֵקִים֙ <WH6965> it hath raised up מִכִּסְאוֹתָ֔ם <WH3678> from their thrones כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> all the kings גוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of the nations

כֻּלָּ֣ם <WH3605> will all יַֽעֲנ֔וּ <WH6030> All they shall speak וְיֹאמְר֖וּ <WH559> and say אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> to you גַּם־ <WH1571> Even אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> you חֻלֵּ֥יתָ <WH2470> unto thee Art thou also become weak כָמ֖וֹנוּ <WH3644> as אֵלֵ֥ינוּ <WH413> we נִמְשָֽׁלְתָּ׃ <WH4911> as we? art thou become like

הוּרַ֥ד <WH3381> is brought down שְׁא֛וֹל <WH7585> to the grave גְּאוֹנֶ֖ךָ <WH1347> Thy pomp הֶמְיַ֣ת <WH1998> [and] the noise נְבָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5035> of thy viols תַּחְתֶּ֙יךָ֙ <WH8478> beneath יֻצַּ֣ע <WH3331> is spread רִמָּ֔ה <WH7415> the worm וּמְכַסֶּ֖יךָ <WH4374> cover תּוֹלֵעָֽה׃ <WH8438> under thee and the worms

אֵ֛יךְ <WH349> How נָפַ֥לְתָּ <WH5307> How art thou fallen מִשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> from heaven הֵילֵ֣ל <WH1966> O Lucifer בֶּן־ <WH1121> son שָׁ֑חַר <WH7837> of the dawn נִגְדַּ֣עְתָּ <WH1438> [how] art thou cut down לָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> to the ground חוֹלֵ֖שׁ <WH2522> which didst weaken עַל־ <WH5921> and גּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> the nations

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you אָמַ֤רְתָּ <WH559> For thou hast said בִֽלְבָבְךָ֙ <WH3824> in thine heart הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> into heaven אֶֽעֱלֶ֔ה <WH5927> I will ascend מִמַּ֥עַל <WH4605> above לְכֽוֹכְבֵי־ <WH3556> the stars אֵ֖ל <WH410> of God אָרִ֣ים <WH7311> I will exalt כִּסְאִ֑י <WH3678> my throne וְאֵשֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> I will sit בְּהַר־ <WH2022> also upon the mount מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation בְּיַרְכְּתֵ֥י <WH3411> in the sides צָפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> of the north
אֶעֱלֶ֖ה <WH5927> I will ascend עַל־ <WH5921> above בָּ֣מֳתֵי <WH1116> above the heights עָ֑ב <WH5645> of the clouds אֶדַּמֶּ֖ה <WH1819> I will be like לְעֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> the most High
אַ֧ךְ <WH389> Nevertheless אֶל־ <WH413> to שְׁא֛וֹל <WH7585> to hell תּוּרָ֖ד <WH3381> Yet thou shalt be brought down אֶל־ <WH413> to יַרְכְּתֵי־ <WH3411> to the sides בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> of the pit

רֹאֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH7200> They that see אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> over יַשְׁגִּ֔יחוּ <WH7688> thee shall narrowly look אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> over יִתְבּוֹנָ֑נוּ <WH995> upon thee [and] consider הֲזֶ֤ה <WH2088> you is this הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> thee [saying Is] this the man מַרְגִּ֣יז <WH7264> to tremble הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> that made the earth מַרְעִ֖ישׁ <WH7493> that did shake מַמְלָכֽוֹת׃ <WH4467> kingdoms

שָׂ֥ם <WH7760> [That] made תֵּבֵ֛ל <WH8398> the world כַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> as a wilderness וְעָרָ֣יו <WH5892> the cities הָרָ֑ס <WH2040> and destroyed אֲסִירָ֖יו <WH615> his prisoners לֹא־ <WH3808> did not פָ֥תַח <WH6605> thereof [that] opened בָּֽיְתָה׃ <WH1004> not the house

כָּל־ <WH3605> All מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> All the kings גוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the nations כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> All שָׁכְב֥וּ <WH7901> [even] all of them lie בְכָב֖וֹד <WH3519> in glory אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one בְּבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <WH1004> in his own house

וְאַתָּ֞ה <WH859> you הָשְׁלַ֤כְתָּ <WH7993> But thou art cast out מִֽקִּבְרְךָ֙ <WH6913> of thy grave כְּנֵ֣צֶר <WH5342> branch נִתְעָ֔ב <WH8581> like an abominable לְב֥וּשׁ <WH3830> [and as] the raiment הֲרֻגִ֖ים <WH2026> of those that are slain מְטֹ֣עֲנֵי <WH2944> thrust through חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> with a sword יוֹרְדֵ֥י <WH3381> that go down אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְנֵי־ <WH68> to the stones ב֖וֹר <WH953> of the pit כְּפֶ֥גֶר <WH6297> as a carcase מוּבָֽס׃ <WH947> trodden under feet

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תֵחַ֤ד <WH3161> Thou shalt not be joined אִתָּם֙ <WH854> in בִּקְבוּרָ֔ה <WH6900> with them in burial כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because אַרְצְךָ֥ <WH776> thy land שִׁחַ֖תָּ <WH7843> because thou hast destroyed עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> thy people הָרָ֑גְתָּ <WH2026> [and] slain לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִקָּרֵ֥א <WH7121> be renowned לְעוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> shall never זֶ֥רַע <WH2233> the seed מְרֵעִֽים׃ <WH7489> of evildoers

הָכִ֧ינוּ <WH3559> Prepare לְבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> for his children מַטְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4293> slaughter בַּעֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> for the iniquity אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <WH1> of their fathers בַּל־ <WH1077> that they do not יָקֻ֙מוּ֙ <WH6965> rise וְיָ֣רְשׁוּ <WH3423> nor possess אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land וּמָלְא֥וּ <WH4390> nor fill פְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> the face תֵבֵ֖ל <WH8398> of the world עָרִֽים׃ <WH5892> cities

וְקַמְתִּ֣י <WH6965> For I will rise up עֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5921> against נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> against them saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְהִכְרַתִּ֨י <WH3772> and cut off לְבָבֶ֜ל <WH894> from Babylon שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> the name וּשְׁאָ֛ר <WH7605> and remnant וְנִ֥ין <WH5209> and son וָנֶ֖כֶד <WH5220> and nephew נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> God

וְשַׂמְתִּ֛יהָ <WH7760> I will also make לְמוֹרַ֥שׁ <WH4180> it a possession קִפֹּ֖ד <WH7090> for the bittern וְאַגְמֵי־ <WH98> and pools מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of water וְטֵֽאטֵאתִ֙יהָ֙ <WH2894> and I will sweep בְּמַטְאֲטֵ֣א <WH4292> it with the besom הַשְׁמֵ֔ד <WH8045> of destruction נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts פ

נִשְׁבַּ֛ע <WH7650> hath sworn יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> The LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֞א <WH3808> as כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> I דִּמִּ֙יתִי֙ <WH1819> Surely as I have thought כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so הָיָ֔תָה <WH1961> has happened וְכַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I יָעַ֖צְתִּי <WH3289> so shall it come to pass and as I have purposed הִ֥יא <WH1931> it תָקֽוּם׃ <WH6965> [so] shall it stand

לִשְׁבֹּ֤ר <WH7665> That I will break אַשּׁוּר֙ <WH804> the Assyrian בְּאַרְצִ֔י <WH776> in my land וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הָרַ֖י <WH2022> and upon my mountains אֲבוּסֶ֑נּוּ <WH947> tread him under foot וְסָ֤ר <WH5493> depart מֵֽעֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> Then עֻלּ֔וֹ <WH5923> then shall his yoke וְסֻ֨בֳּל֔וֹ <WH5448> from off them and his burden מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from שִׁכְמ֖וֹ <WH7926> from off their shoulders יָסֽוּר׃ <WH5493> depart

זֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise הָעֵצָ֥ה <WH6098> This [is] the purpose הַיְּעוּצָ֖ה <WH6095> shut עַל־ <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> upon the whole earth וְזֹ֛את <WH2063> likewise הַיָּ֥ד <WH3027> and this [is] the hand הַנְּטוּיָ֖ה <WH5186> that is stretched out עַל־ <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> upon all the nations

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> For the LORD צְבָא֛וֹת <WH6635> of hosts יָעָ֖ץ <WH3289> hath purposed וּמִ֣י <WH4310> and who יָפֵ֑ר <WH6565> and who shall disannul וְיָד֥וֹ <WH3027> [it]? and his hand הַנְּטוּיָ֖ה <WH5186> [is] stretched out וּמִ֥י <WH4310> who יְשִׁיבֶֽנָּה׃ <WH7725> and who shall turn it back פ
בִּשְׁנַת־ <WH8141> In the year מ֖וֹת <WH4194> died הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> that king אָחָ֑ז <WH271> Ahaz הָיָ֖ה <WH1961> came הַמַּשָּׂ֥א <WH4853> was this burden הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׂמְחִ֤י <WH8055> Rejoice פְלֶ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH6429> not thou whole Palestina כֻּלֵּ֔ךְ <WH3605> all כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because נִשְׁבַּ֖ר <WH7665> thee is broken שֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> because the rod מַכֵּ֑ךְ <WH5221> of him that smote כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because מִשֹּׁ֤רֶשׁ <WH8328> root נָחָשׁ֙ <WH5175> for out of the serpent's יֵ֣צֵא <WH3318> shall come forth צֶ֔פַע <WH6848> a cockatrice וּפִרְי֖וֹ <WH6529> and his fruit שָׂרָ֥ף <WH8314> serpent מְעוֹפֵֽף׃ <WH5774> flying

וְרָעוּ֙ <WH7462> shall feed בְּכוֹרֵ֣י <WH1060> And the firstborn דַלִּ֔ים <WH1800> of the poor וְאֶבְיוֹנִ֖ים <WH34> and the needy לָבֶ֣טַח <WH983> in safety יִרְבָּ֑צוּ <WH7257> shall lie down וְהֵמַתִּ֤י <WH4191> and I will kill בָֽרָעָב֙ <WH7458> with famine שָׁרְשֵׁ֔ךְ <WH8328> thy root וּשְׁאֵרִיתֵ֖ךְ <WH7611> thy remnant יַהֲרֹֽג׃ <WH2026> and he shall slay

הֵילִ֤ילִֽי <WH3213> Howl שַׁ֙עַר֙ <WH8179> O gate זַֽעֲקִי־ <WH2199> cry עִ֔יר <WH5892> O city נָמ֖וֹג <WH4127> [art] dissolved פְּלֶ֣שֶׁת <WH6429> thou whole Palestina כֻּלֵּ֑ךְ <WH3605> all כִּ֤י <WH3588> from מִצָּפוֹן֙ <WH6828> from the north עָשָׁ֣ן <WH6227> a smoke בָּ֔א <WH935> for there shall come וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and there בּוֹדֵ֖ד <WH909> and none [shall be] alone בְּמוֹעָדָֽיו׃ <WH4151> in his appointed times

וּמַֽה־ <WH4100> How יַּעֲנֶ֖ה <WH6030> What shall [one] then answer מַלְאֲכֵי־ <WH4397> the messengers ג֑וֹי <WH1471> Gentile כִּ֤י <WH3588> for יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Jehovah יִסַּ֣ד <WH3245> hath founded צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> Zion וּבָ֥הּ יֶחֱס֖וּ <WH2620> shall trust עֲנִיֵּ֥י <WH6041> and the poor עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> of his people ס
